en.displaysInfo: Displays information such as volume/page references, variant readings, etc.
en.onlyWorks: This only works with certain texts, which include translations by Sujato and Brahmali.
en.activatePaliDescription: Analyzes the Pali text and attempts to display the word meaning. Note that this is an aid only, and is not always accurate. Word meanings are from the New Concise Pali English Dictionary.
en.activateChineseDescription: This enables word lookup for ancient Chinese texts. Word meanings are from the Digital Dictionary of Buddhism.
en.changePaliScript: Change the script of the Pali text
en.changePaliScriptDescription: This enables you to read the Pali text in various scripts.
en.rememberSettingsDescription: Select this to remember these settings next time you visit SuttaCentral.
en.textViewEnabled: {textView}-view is now enabled on applicable texts.
en.lookupDictionaryEnabled: The {lookupDictionary} lookup dictionary is now enabled.
en.paliLookupDictionaryDisabled: The Pali lookup dictionary is now disabled.
en.chineseLookupDictionaryDisabled: The 汉语 lookup dictionary is now disabled.
en.scriptChanged: Pali is now shown in {paliScript} script.
en.rememberSettingsEnabled: The settings you chose will be remembered next time you visit SuttaCentral.
en.rememberSettingsDisabled: The settings you chose will not be remembered next time you visit SuttaCentral.
en.referenceDescription: See reference information for various editions.
en.notesDescription: See translator's notes, variant readings, etc..
en.textViewDescription: Some texts on SuttaCentral are “segmented”; the original text and translation are matched line by line. (See list of segmented texts.)For such texts, see both root text and translation.
